items.value: Add more <color=red>F</color><color=yellow>U</color><color=green>N</color> to your game with a variety of settings! You can combine them however you like!
Oops... Looks like school has problem with electricity
Game is easy for you? Turn on this fun setting to make it more complicated!

Normal hard mode is easy for you? Try Hard Mode but <color=yellow>PLUS</color>. It more complicated than normal hard mode!
<s>Ruthless mode</s>
School is very dirty, so Gotta Sweep will try to clean it! But it looks like it will be impossible to clean the school...
No more keyboard to move! Use <color=#50077AFF>infinite</color> grappling hook instead
Baldi's cloning machine are broken... What can goes wrong....?
You're boring about slow equal gameplay? That fun settings make your game REALLY FAST!

Your screen ugly need screensaver
<color=red>WARNING: THIS FUN SETTING DISABLE FULL SCREEN MODE</color>
You're missing YCTP from Baldi's Basics Classic? You can return YCTP using this fun setting!
You snuck into the school after hours! Use BSODAs and map to avoid being caught by Principal of the Thing! Or else...

Wow! Baldi now can teach not only basics math, but also algebra!
Each YCTP problem will replace with quadratic equation
Try speedrun Baldi's superschool in 1.5 minutes! Each collected notebook and closed elevator adds 30 second to timer!
